data.fullContent: The invasion of Japan was a planned military action, called "Operation Downfall". This was to be the Allied forces invasion of Japan to end the Second World War. After the United States dropped nuclear bombs on Hiroshima and Nagasaki, the Japanese surrendered, so there was no need for an invasion. Operation Downfall was cancelled.
data.answer: 入侵日本是一场有计划的军事行动，称为“衰败行动”。这是盟军入侵日本，结束了第二次世界大战。美国在广岛和长崎投下原子弹后，日本投降了，所以没有入侵的必要。衰败行动被取消。
